function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"SARS-CoV-2 infection spread due to poor ventilation","Impact":"Rapid spread of COVID-19 in the community","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation rates and circulation of air, implementing air purification technologies","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers","People":"Community members in poorly ventilated areas","Owner":"Building management and public health organizations"},{"Description":"Contaminated air and surfaces in healthcare facilities and nursing homes","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission among patients and healthcare workers","Mitigation":"Regular and thorough cleaning of surfaces, improving ventilation and air filtration","Technologies":"Real-time air quality monitoring, air purification systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Hospital management, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"HVAC system's role in spreading infected droplets in indoor environments","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to infected droplets for individuals in indoor spaces","Mitigation":"Improving HVAC airflow and filtration, implementing air disinfection technology","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air disinfection devices","People":"Individuals in indoor environments","Owner":"Building owners, facility management"}]}
